input_ref: PSE Legal Pages — Privacy Policy and Terms of Service pages for marketing site
manual_intervention_reason: PM build step failed due to nested Claude Code session limitation. Implementation completed directly in active Claude Code session. Marketing site located at /home/tomr/projects/pse-marketing (not PSE--Projects).
notes: Added /privacy and /terms routes to PSE marketing site (Next.js 15 App Router). Created privacy/page.tsx (11 sections, TOC, blue summary callout, JSON-LD), terms/page.tsx (14 sections, TOC, blue acceptance callout, amber warning callout in Section 7, JSON-LD), FooterLegalLinks.tsx (client component with usePathname active state).
